marketingInfo.overview: You will be using Unity 3D software in this module - Unity is the go-to game development application by major mobile game companies, especially because of its ease of use, straightforwardness, and tons of support available throughout the web. With very basic scripting skills which anyone can acquire, Unity opens up the possibility of one becoming a professional in a very little amount of time.

examAndCertification.question: Who will be providing the course certificate and what will be its validity?
examAndCertification.answer: Upon successful completion of this course, CareerLabs will provide you with an industry-recognized course completion certificate which has a lifelong validity.

examAndCertification.question: How can I get the Certification?
examAndCertification.answer: Once you finish the course, the certification is awarded to you based on the submission of the assignments/projects that are part of the course requirements. Our counsellor will help you with all the details before you enrol and start the learning journey.

courseAdvisors.name: Mr. A Sai
courseAdvisors.description: Mr. Sai is an Art Mentor for the Assets Department at Xentrix Studios where he teaches art, 3D modeling and texturing. A graduate from the College of Fine Arts, Chennai, He has been drawing for as long as he can remember. He started his career as an illustrator and moved to being a modeler. During his 7+ years as the Head of Modeling at DreamWorks Animation, he has worked on projects like Trolls, Penguins of Madagascar and Puss in the Boots.

faqs.question: What is Profile Building?
faqs.answer: Profile Building is the art of consciously working towards your professional goals. As students or as working professionals, companies recruit people who are focused on their Career Goals. The best way to showcase one's interests and goals is to build up one's profile and show it on LinkedIn, CV/ Resume, Industry Forums etc. All these activities and much more contribute to the process of Profile Building. CareerLabs, India's Premier Ed-Tech Company in Partnership with BYJU's, helps 1000s of students every year to build up their Profiles.
